apiConfig.title: Please Set Worker URL
apiConfig.description: Please enter your Cloudflare Worker URL to continue using the application.
apiConfig.saveSuccess: Worker URL has been saved successfully!
apiConfig.emptyUrlError: Please enter a Worker URL to continue
apiConfig.guideTitle: If you don't have a Worker URL yet, follow these steps:

guideSteps.step1: Run the script start-flux-schnell.bat in the project root directory
guideSteps.step2: In the main menu, select "2. Deploy Worker and get URL, then start WeiUI"
guideSteps.step3: Follow the script instructions to complete the deployment

imageGenerator.title: Generate Image
imageGenerator.promptPlaceholder: e.g.: 1 girl, cute, drinking water, glass cup, morning light, cartoon style, simple background. Please use English for best results, as Flux may not accurately recognize other languages.
imageGenerator.stepsHint: Higher steps result in better image quality, but require longer processing time.
imageGenerator.noImagePlaceholder: Generated images will be displayed here

tips.title: Tips:
tips.tip1: Detailed prompts will yield better results
tips.tip2: Try different step counts to balance generation speed and image quality
tips.tip3: Click on images in the history to reuse that prompt
tips.tip4: Generated images can be downloaded and saved locally
